title: Introduction to Programming
subtitle: Learn the fundamentals of programming logic and structure

topics.title: Introduction to Programming Languages
topics.description: What is programming, types of programming languages, history.

topics.title: Variables and Data Types
topics.description: Understanding variables, constants, data types and declarations.

topics.title: Operators and Expressions
topics.description: Arithmetic, logical, relational, assignment and bitwise operators.

topics.title: Control Structures
topics.description: Conditional statements (if, else, switch) and loops (for, while, do-while).

topics.title: Functions
topics.description: Creating and invoking functions, parameters, return values.

topics.title: Arrays and Strings
topics.description: Single and multi-dimensional arrays, string manipulation.

topics.title: Debugging and Error Handling
topics.description: Types of errors, debugging techniques, basic exception handling.

topics.title: Introduction to IDEs and Compilation
topics.description: Using development environments like VS Code, compiling and running code.
